system_prompt.description: The system prompt to use for the agent's interactions. This prompt sets the context and behavior for the agent.
system_prompt.default: You are a research assistant that helps people find information and analyze it.

model.description: The name of the language model to use for the agent's main interactions. Should be in the form: provider/model-name.

max_search_results.description: The maximum number of search results to return for each search query.

max_web_research_loops.description: Number of research iterations to perform for deep dive research.

search_api.description: Web search API to use for research

fetch_full_page.description: Whether to fetch and analyze the full content of web pages
